title: Boat with 1981 Trailer (Does not include motor)
item_description:
Boat with 1981 Trailer (Does not include motor)

Boat Specifications:

  • CF Number/Hull: Illegible, see last photo in photo gallery
    • Appears to read: 9579IP 
    • Not DMV registered
    • Bill of Sale Only

1981 VIP Carrier Trailer Specifications:

  • VIN: 1VP6417S1B1000008
  • License per DMV (not included, lost): 4JN9690
    • Expiration Date: 10/31/2016

Note: The Seller sells this boat/trailer to clean off the property. The last known registered owner is unknown, therefore, a Due Diligent Effort is being completed. Trailer: Application for Replacement Title, Transfer Form, and Due Diligent Effort for registered owner paperwork will be mailed 2-3 weeks after removal. The Bidder shall not bid on behalf of another individual; the Bidder/Purchaser/DMV Registrant must be the same. The Buyer is fully responsible for all aspects of registration, applying for new license plates, transfer, taxes, and fees due to the DMV. Boat: Buyer will receive a bill of sale only. Buyer is fully responsible for the new registration process, inspections, transfer, taxes, fees, and inspections due to DMV to register this item in the Buyer's name if they so choose to obtain a title/license/registration.
